query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM conversations) as total_conversations,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_messages) as total_messages,
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT question) FROM chat_messages WHERE role = 'user') as unique_questions;

  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM conversations) as total_conversations,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_messages) as total_messages,
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT question) FROM chat_messages WHERE role = 'user') as unique_questions;
